FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Barracks
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A buildings to house the local troops. +1 military level.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: TradingPost
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A small outpost that roving traders frequent. +10 tithe modifier.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Migrant Housing
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: Local housing for traveling migrants to stay in. +2 Max worker, +2 Over Max worker.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Quarry
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: Torn up land being used to mine for valuable ore. +.5 to base mining production.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Training Yard
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A place for your soldiers to train. +10% combat efficiency.
